title: UI Interface Update
message: The interface has been updated to be more modern, responsive, and attractive to enhance user experience.

title: API Samehadaku Stability
message:
Added fallback information for Samehadaku API. Sometimes the API may return errors depending on request limits or server response. Recommended solutions:
- Run the request on a VPS or other hosting service for better uptime.
- Test the API response directly in the browser before implementation.
- Implement retry/fallback handling when the main endpoint fails.
- Note: In some cases, integration works on websites even if local testing fails.
